Class MapFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • uem.dam.seg.whereipark.Main.fragment.MapFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback

    public class MapFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
    A simple Fragment subclass.
